column3: I digress. I opted for breakfast libations--hey
column5: who am I to say no??? There are lots of juice options for the mimosas here--orange
column9: and a couple others that fail my memory right now. I opted for the apple
column10: and I'm so glad I did! My only complaint about the mimosas here is that they don't offer carafes or pitchers. Then again
column12: I guess they don't want people lingering for TOO long at the tables/bar.
